name: Ashish Kumar
aboutMe: An enthusiastic software engineer looking for challenging projects to work on!

personalProjects.name: Server Log Analysis
personalProjects.description: Analysis of server logs via Hadoop Streaming

achievements: Implemented a new pricing model known as Flex which revolutionizing log analytics pricing by offering free, unlimited log ingest.
Developed Sumo Logic listing on AWS SaaS Quick Launch to reduce the time and resources required to configure and launch Sumo Logic on AWS.
Designed & implemented the Self Service checkout flow which successfully helped in converting free & trial customers to paying customers.
Redesigned the activation page to boost the activation rate & drive customers towards the activation point.
Helped in migration of legacy Angular JS framework to modern React JS.
Improved performance by implementing caching & breaking large APIs into smaller APIs which can be parallelly called.
Developed and maintained automated CI / CD pipelines for code deployment using Bitbucket pipelines reducing the development time by 80%
Designed an web app from scratch that creates basic assessment question types like MCQ, Drag and Drop etc. It has been showcased at various EdTech Conferences
Created a Jenkins Job which triggered child jobs fortnightly so that tech leads could automatically get SonarQube and Checkmarx issues before the sprint meeting
Implemented a Classification Machine Learning Algorithm which helped in business decisions related to web accessibility
Collaborated with various vendors on JIRA to solve bugs and issues related to MyITLabs SIMS. This was used by Pearson to help students get Microsoft certifications
Developed an Android Application that can communicate with the company's portable spectrometer
Implemented a USB interface to setup communication between the Android App and spectrometer
Added capabilities to export the raw data in CSV format & save the graph in JPEG format which enabled users to easily share their data
Created a Digital Signage solution using Python and Shell Scripting for Dillboard (a product that lets advertisers play their ads on Digital Billboards)
Used Raspberry Pi to connect to backend, download the ads, and play them using a media player at the scheduled time; Implemented the feature to auto update the software via OTA updates
Worked on ZXQK, an iOS application that let's you discover cutting-edge content & cast opinions
Implemented Firebase Authentication to let users sign in using Facebook and Google Accounts
Created an Android Application for Shield (a smart door lock that could be unlocked by a smartphone and provided live video feed over the internet)
Added the capability of communication over Bluetooth for locking and unlocking of the door
Used real time streaming protocol to provide a smooth live feed over the internet directly to the customer’s smartphone

education.university: Ambedkar Institute of Technology, Indraprastha University

researchPublications: Khari, M., Dalal, R., Misra, U., & Kumar, A. (2020). AndroSet: An Automated Tool to Create Datasets for Android Malware Detection and Functioning with WoT. Smart Innovation of Web of Things, 187
conferencePapers: Ashish Kumar, Udit Misra “Real-time Twitter Data Analysis Using Apache Storm” Computing for Sustainable Global Development (INDIACom), 2017 4th International Conference on IEEE, 2017
Udit Misra, Ashish Kumar “Data Visualization Tool-A tool for comprehensive study of data” Computing for Sustainable Global Development (INDIACom), 2017 4th International Conference on IEEE, 2017
